name: Color Bind
description:
You need 3 controllers to play, as well as customed colored-glasses (basically you cannot play at home - sorry!)

You have to find all 3 keys (the capsules) and get out of the maze.

The twist is that your colored-glasses prevent you from seeing one color - so you only see a fraction of the maze!

Game assignment with the following constraints:

-Asymmetrical

-Mix of 2 genres

-Has digital and non-digital components
